includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Emmy Award winner James Spader (Boston Legal) is the world's most wanted criminal in this electrifying US drama delivering conspiracy and action.

includedAssets.title: The Freelancer
includedAssets.synopsis: Master criminal Red has the FBI's finest eating out of the palm of his hand when he goes undercover with Liz to catch a paid assassin.

includedAssets.title: Wujiing
includedAssets.synopsis: Deception is the aim of the game as Red chases a high-ranking Chinese spy who once employed him and Liz secretly investigates her husband's past.

includedAssets.title: The Courier

includedAssets.title: Gina Zanetakos
includedAssets.synopsis: Looks can be deceiving so Red cautiously pursues a dangerous and beautiful terrorist. In contrast, Liz's judgement is swayed by feelings for Tom.

includedAssets.synopsis: It seems money really does make the world go round as the FBI agents are gripped with panic about a plot to cripple the American economy.

includedAssets.synopsis: Red's days of playing judge, jury and executioner could be over. News of his manhunt prompts a man on his list to try to capture the ex-con.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Raymond ‘Red’ Reddington (James Spader) is the world’s most wanted criminal, but offers his services to the FBI to put away everyone he’s ever worked with. Electrifying U.S. smash-hit.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Red Reddington is wanted by the FBI, but offers to help catch criminals he’s worked with.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Raymond ‘Red’ Reddington (James Spader) is the world’s most wanted criminal, but offers his services to the FBI to put away everyone he’s ever worked with. Electrifying U.S. smash-hit.

includedIn.title: The Blacklist
includedIn.synopsis: Raymond 'Red' Reddington (James Spader), one of the world's most wanted fugitives, walks into the FBI headquarters with his hands up and a wry smile. Claiming to have unparalleled information on dangerous felons at large, Red wants to negotiate a deal to catch a presumed-dead terrorist… under one condition: he speaks only to rookie profiler Elizabeth 'Liz' Keen (Megan Boone). No-one knows why the criminal mastermind is so interested in Elizabeth, or indeed, if he's even telling the truth, but it's clear the FBI should proceed with caution…
includedIn.shortSynopsis: James Spader stars as master criminal-turned FBI informant Raymond Reddington in this thrilling drama.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Raymond 'Red' Reddington (James Spader), one of the world's most wanted fugitives, walks into the FBI headquarters with his hands up and a wry smile. Claiming to have unparalleled information on dangerous felons at large, Red wants to negotiate a deal to catch a presumed-dead terrorist… under one condition: he speaks only to rookie profiler Elizabeth 'Liz' Keen (Megan Boone). No-one knows why the criminal mastermind is so interested in Elizabeth, or indeed, if he's even telling the truth, but it's clear the FBI should proceed with caution…
